Parameter.Description: Request reopen mode: return in status open for modification
No commission percent adjustment. Used as default value
Do not distribute payment plan amount on Proportional Daily base between due dates
Keep original policy end
the original policy attribute POLICY_NO will be added with postfix "/[sequential number]" (default value)

Qtatus of the renewal policy is application
Cover Instances are available.
110 days
Aline payment plan, for policy less than one year.
